ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: Verifica na tabela de Controle de Carga se o processo já foi executado para da Diária registrada no Arquivo de Parâmetros.
SESSION.NAME: SSN_VERIFICA_CONTROLE_CARGA

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections
Fail task if any command fails
Pre SQL
Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
USE $$PARAM_07;
SELECT $$PARAM_05 FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 0 AND CAST(DT_FIM_REGISTRO AS DATE) = DATEADD(DAY, -1, CAST('$$PARAM_02' AS DATE)) AND HASHBYTES('MD5', $$PARAM_03) IN ( SELECT HASHBYTES('MD5', $$PARAM_03) FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 1 AND CAST(DT_INICIO_REGISTRO AS DATE) = CAST('$$PARAM_02' AS DATE) )

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
USE $$PARAM_07;
SELECT $$PARAM_05 FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 0 AND CAST(DT_FIM_REGISTRO AS DATE) = DATEADD(DAY, -1, CAST('$$PARAM_02' AS DATE)) AND HASHBYTES('MD5', $$PARAM_03) NOT IN ( SELECT HASHBYTES('MD5', $$PARAM_03) FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 1 AND CAST(DT_INICIO_REGISTRO AS DATE) = CAST('$$PARAM_02' AS DATE) )

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
USE $$PARAM_07;
SELECT $$PARAM_05 FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 1 AND CAST(DT_INICIO_REGISTRO AS DATE) = CAST('$$PARAM_02' AS DATE) AND HASHBYTES('MD5', $$PARAM_03) IN ( SELECT HASHBYTES('MD5', $$PARAM_03) FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 0 AND CAST(DT_FIM_REGISTRO AS DATE) = DATEADD(DAY, -1, CAST('$$PARAM_02' AS DATE)) )

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: Faz a carga dos dados na tabela de destino a partir do arquivo de dados gerado em $$dir_loader com o delimitador ";" (ponto-e-virgula)
SESSION.NAME: SSN_DIM_CAMPANHA_VENDA_LOAD_BULK_INSERT

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Pre SQL
Sql Query
ATTRIBUTE.VALUE:
USE $$PARAM_07;
SELECT '$$PARAM_01', 1 FROM GCS.$$PARAM_01 WHERE IC_REGISTRO_VIGENTE = 9
